attributes.action: Stop unnecessary fit-to-work assesments for the terminally ill and those disabled with dibilitating, irreversble conditions.
attributes.additional_details: Many terminally ill and disabled people are forced to repeat the indignity of stressful and unnecessary back-to-work interviews to re-qualify for benefits.  Not only is this unnecessary financially but creates unnecessary stress, which leads to further illness and thus creates extra pressure on the NHS.
